game.name: dice'n'sphere
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dice'n'sphere is a relaxed puzzle game. Push, modify, stack and split dice to push them into the appropriate goals, fill every goal in a level to clear it. Unlock over 60 levels full of interesting mechanics and listen to a chill lo-fi soundtrack.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dice'n'sphere is a relaxed puzzle game. Push, modify, stack and split dice to push them into the appropriate goals, fill every goal in a level to clear it. Unlock over 60 levels full of interesting mechanics and listen to a chill lo-fi soundtrack.
